participant_1.background:
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
i live in the city of grand rapids , michigan.
my favorite player is mike trout.
I collect memories of my accomplishments.
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.

participant_2.background:
I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
I watch my husband leave for work before I go to the basketball court.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
i m often late for class.
i wish i made more money.

content.text: Hi there, my name is John. I live in Grand Rapids, Michigan. What's your name?
Hi John, my name is Ashley. I love traveling the world and eating burritos. What's your favorite thing to do?
I love collecting memories of my accomplishments. I also like to look my best even when I'm at work. What do you do for work?
I'm a basketball coach at the local community college. I love my job, but I wish I made more money.
That's great! I'm a software engineer at Google. I love my job, and I'm also happy with my salary.
Wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to work for Google.
You should definitely apply! They're always hiring.
I will, thanks for the advice!
No problem! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to the basketball game with my husband. We're playing against our rival school, so it should be a lot of fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm going to stay in and watch some movies.
Sounds relaxing! Have a good weekend!
